refresh-interval.tooltip: How often to update the GPU stats (in milliseconds).

show-temp.tooltip: Show GPU temperature in the panel.

show-memory.tooltip: Show GPU memory usage in the panel.

memory-display-mode.tooltip: Choose how to display memory usage: as text or as a pie chart.

show-gpu-util.tooltip: Show GPU utilization percentage in the panel.

gpu-display-mode.tooltip: Choose how to display GPU utilization: as text or as a pie chart.

show-fan-speed.tooltip: Show GPU fan speed percentage in the panel.

fan-display-mode.tooltip: Choose how to display fan speed: as text or as a pie chart.
